title: MEAS CIV_ENV 332-0-20 Building Construction Estimating

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Students will learn the entire process of producing a complete, detailed estimate for a specific
building project. They will be required to read and understand construction documents,
perform detailed quantity surveys, develop detailed estimates for general conditions,
sitework, concrete, and carpentry, analyze subcontractor proposals and tabulate a complete
estimate.

subject: CIV_ENV
